meta.title: Awesome Works AI — More Time, Less Costs | AI Automation for Business
meta.description: Save 20+ hours weekly and cut operational costs by 40%. AI that takes over routine tasks so you can focus on growth. Free consultation.

hero.subtitle: Automate routine tasks, serve customers 24/7, and scale your business without hiring. Real results in weeks, not months.

services.subtitle: See how AI can increase your revenue and reduce costs

cards.title: Find hidden savings
cards.description: Discover where your company wastes time and money. Get a process automation roadmap with ROI estimates — before you spend a dime.

cards.title: Serve customers 24/7
cards.description: Stop losing leads due to slow responses. Your customers get help instantly, anytime — while your team handles what matters most.

cards.title: Free up your team's time
cards.description: Reports, analysis, data management — let AI handle it. Your people focus on strategy and growth, not tedious tasks.

cards.title: End repetitive work
cards.description: Documents, emails, data entry — all automated. Zero errors, zero boring tasks, more time for what matters.

products.title: Our Products
products.subtitle: Solutions built and maintained by our team

callwise.tagline: Every call scored. Every rep better. Automatically.
callwise.description: AI analyzes 100% of sales calls and shows what separates top performers from the rest. Your team learns faster, closes more deals.

goose.tagline: Test your AI agents like a pro.
goose.description: Python library for comprehensive LLM agent testing. Define expectations in natural language, verify tool calls, analyze results in a web dashboard.

ask.description: AI that automates accounting — from invoices to reconciliations. Less manual work, zero mistakes, full control over your company's finances.
ask.microcopy: For businesses & accounting firms · Early Access

reviews.title: What our clients say
reviews.subtitle: See reviews from clients already using our AI solutions
reviews.fallback_text: Check our reviews on Google and see how we help businesses save time and money with AI.

items.q: What types of projects do you specialize in?
items.a: We specialize in AI solutions and automation: chatbots, call analysis, process automation, recommendation systems. If your problem can be solved with AI — let's talk.

items.q: How much does a project cost?
items.a: Every project is priced individually based on your specific needs and expectations. After a free discovery consultation we prepare a tailored quote — usually within 5 business days.

items.q: How long does a project take?
items.a: MVP in 4–6 weeks, full product in 2–4 months. Depends on complexity — we establish a concrete timeline after the discovery call.
Yes. After launch we offer maintenance and development packages. We don't abandon clients after deployment.
Python, TypeScript, React, Astro, OpenAI, Anthropic, LangChain, RAG pipelines, cloud-native (AWS/GCP). We match the stack to the project needs.
Book a free consultation via form or Calendly. In a 30-minute call we'll learn your needs and propose a direction. No commitment.

final_cta.title: How much can you save?
final_cta.subtitle: Let's talk about your processes. We'll show you concrete numbers — how much time and money you can recover. No strings attached.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Write to us or schedule a call
